website_summaries.verdict: This package provides everything you need for effective pain relief, protection, and toe alignment. A value-packed choice.
pros: Pliable, breathable guards help with tight shoes
Includes big toe strap for exercising and strengthening muscles
All silicone components are 100% medical grade
cons: A few accounts of the sleeve spacers falling off after washing

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful in my experience.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Use with talc or foot powder as directed to avoid athletes foot, and to help prevent tearing the gel devices. As the instructions say, each person will find their favorite items to use among the different pieces included in the set. Remember, you are trying to alter your body; muscles, tendons and bones were affected when the bunion grew and they won’t want to bend back without complaining. Expect some discomfort, but it should improve. If it gets more painful, simply stop using them. In my experience I found them very helpful in relieving pain and discomfort associated with my bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Great collection for the value
customer_reviews.text: Great collection for the value. I've seen other offers for just the sleeve that are more expensive than these 7 pieces and they are the same exact product. 10/10 recommended for immediate relief. Also comes with specific instructions and advice on when to wear which piece and with what.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This kit has helped me a lot... feels like my bunion is going away!
customer_reviews.text: I literally cannot leave the house with out my foot thing (whatever these are called... bunion relief protector?.. whatever... at my house, we just call it my "foot thing") Some times, I forget to put it on and I wear my shoes for about an hour and the pain comes back... I will say that the silicone shieldy thingy takes some getting used to as it was painful to my other toes and my foot... after you get used to it, it is a huge relief.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Stowell

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. Knowing how awesome they work
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Knowing how awesome they work, I would've paid $50 in a heartbeat. I ordered this kit for my dad as well and he loves it too! It's so easy to use and doesn't cut off circulation like other kits I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Madigan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit to help with bunions.
customer_reviews.text: It's not possible to cure or fix a bunion but this kit definitely helps deal with it and prevent it from progressing to a painful irritation. I wear the spaces during the day and the sleeves at night. I cannot wear the sleeves all night at a certain point they start to hurt and I remove them. I know it's because it's holding my toes in a better position but I am sure as time goes by it will be less painful. The exerciser feels great on my toes after I use it. This kit is great quality and a great value. My goal is to continue to run long distance pain free and avoid surgery at all costs!
customer_reviews.author: Javajane

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart very quickly!  Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were great at first. Very comfortable and fits in shoes nicely. They both have fallen apart! Cheaply made! I wish I could get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: he recommended this to ease pain and will fit perfectly in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunion on the side of my toe and bone spurs on the top of the big toe joint (I had my foot x-rayed). I have found that for the price you pay it is completely worth it. It comes with instructions on how to use each. I typically use the toe separator with guard. While at the foot doctor, he recommended this to ease pain and will fit perfectly in your shoe. It also stops the rubbing. I would recommend it! Although they all feel weird to begin with, after the first few times it becomes very comfortable. I wouldn't say this is a permanent fix, but it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thankful
customer_reviews.text: So thankful someone has come up with this kit. I REALLY don't want to ever have surgery and I think this product will help me avoid that. All pieces are extremely comfortable. I haven't tried the exercise piece yet, don't guess I will like that one as much, because, well, it's exercise! But going to try it because I'm sure it will be helpful. Thanks for an awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product, breaks quickly and provides little relief before breaking.
customer_reviews.text: I bet this product works on smaller feet. It really doesn't do anything on my feet. I wear a size 12mens, not huge but these are too small to actually move my toes in any meaningful way. The toe puller thing is awesome, really helps the toe. It's soft and that's nice. I bet this works for people with little feet, too. The same people that think I live this blissful life, reaching the best food items in all of the cabinets. We're all suffering out here. Had to edit my review because they all have broken within 2 uses. Every one of the soft toe things broke. These are not useful, I'd gamble on another product instead.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE product, Highly effective, recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE that there are so many different components to this -- it allows me the flexibility to wear what works for my situation (walking around my house, inside my shoes for work, strengthening the tendons and muscles, or just giving my feet a break at the end of the day). I use one of the piece sets every day. HIGHLY RECOMMEND. The pieces really do provide relief from my foot pain associated with my bunion / developing bunion & honestly just general foot pain from walking all day (in not always the best shoes)
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Silicone pad cracked
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the protector sleeve portion of the kit. After just one overnight use the silicone pads on both sleeves have cracked in the middle and the sock portion is very loose. I can't speak for the other items as I haven't given them enough time but if you are looking mainly for the sleeve, I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: reverse the damage done
customer_reviews.text: I wore high heels a lot when I was young and it resulted in a lot of headache. Also both of my big toes are a bit crooked and tend to lean inward toward the rest. I bought these to help correct this issue. There are three different things in there I can alternate with. See my pics. I wear them when I am inside the house. Hard to wear them inside shoes cause they have certain thickness so unless you have larger shoes than your usual size, it will not fit. I also wear one of them to sleep so I can maximize the correction.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelearn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Using everything in the kit, every day. No improvement at all. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: FT Fitness

customer_reviews.title: I was not satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking it might help like the ad said but nothing worked and sometimes they became so uncomfortable that I had to take them off and the piece that is suppose to separate the big toe and tthe one next to it and then cushion your bunion while wearing shoes broke after a week so that is not working. Even though it didn't cost as much as some other products I saw advertised I don't feel I got my money's worth and I don't think I would be able to recommend this to anyone since I was not satisfied myself.I
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet relief
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great options! Great price! Almost instant relief with so many choices to use. Highly recommend. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: A flight attendant with bad feet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because the reviews about it were glowing. I was skeptical but I am a believer! I wore the piece in the photo under my shoe that had a slight heel and it was incredible how much of a difference it made. I’m wearing it as much as humanly possible and doing the toe exercises. I had a shooting pain up the side of my foot from the bunion and it’s nonexistent with this product on! I can feel it working (which is a tad uncomfortable) but overall I can say that this product has already made a huge difference. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: C. King

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This product comes with a lot of pieces which is makes it a good value for the price. I tried the sleeves for both feet. They are comfortable but roll up a little beneath my socks. I mostly use the soft white bunion protector and spacer on my left foot. It seems to work ok but might be a bit flimsy. I expect it will wear out quickly, good thing there are two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nanazon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy them if your wanting to fix a bunion.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for wearing to cover a bunion if your shoes are a little tight. I was hoping it would help correct a bunion as it states but wearing the corrector everyday for 60 days and it didn't change anything. The sleeve was very comfortable to wear to help soften the shoes against my bunion , but the excercise did nothing. I was disappointed as I really hoped it might help correct it as it is not attractive, but I guess I'm stuck with it unless I feel like going under the knife!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FIXED!
customer_reviews.text: It fixed my Hallux Valgus! It was hurting like crazy. I have a very bad habit of shaking my leg with my toe on a ground, made my joint pop out over time. I was wondering what it was, just hurting like CR*P! Couldn't even walk well. I had this on for couple of days, and it hasn't been hurting for a while now. I try not to shake my legs (I still do, but less). I haven't even needed this since.
customer_reviews.author: Kensukebook

customer_reviews.title: Purchased based on physician referral
customer_reviews.text: Husband had major leg surgery that led to a large bunion appearing on same foot. Doctor advised purchasing this instead of more surgery so took a chance. Will advise - husbands foot is extra wide so the fit is tight but not unbearable in wearing. Thin enough that wearing with a sock while wearing his work boots is not as challenging as we expected. This is NOT an overnight fix and will require time and patience but I can say that so far he is wearing it daily and it seems to have helped with foot pain he was experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Voyles

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used the Gel Pad Bunion Protector Sleeves and the silicon gel took off the cloth, the first day using it. The product seems to work good, because it healed the pain in my foot right away, BUT it needs to be improved in the material quality. I tried to get a replacement of the Gel Pad Bunion Protector Sleeves in excellent conditions (better quality) but it was impossible. So, Amazon processed a refund to receive my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent return policy!
customer_reviews.text: The silicone was quite soft and comfortable to wear, but it was *so* soft and squishy that the "corrector" did not effectively support or correct my bunion. The silicone toe separator just smooshed down under the pressure of my moderate bunion and squished out from between my toes without supporting anything. I've returned them for a full refund, and did not have to pay return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ballenger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This is the only piece I have used so far (just opened the package) but just this piece alone offers amazing pain relief!! I am positive the other pieces will do the same!! So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Day

customer_reviews.title: Good product that helps many issues with bunion pain.
customer_reviews.text: I liked all the products that came with this set. I didn’t use them all at the same time. The gel bunion protector was great at work, while the toe we-Eratosthenes was comfortable on walks or to wear to bed with socks. I liked the toe exercises, I had never used one and thought I could make my own, but this was efficient and reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Rhona

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: They help but I will say they are very smooth material so they slide off easy. One thing that annoys me like crazy...they need to make them a cotton material so they won't slip. Update! At first I was really excited about these because I could feel the pressure between my toes pushing out that big toe. However these are just impossible to wear. THEY DO NOT STAY ON. it's so frustrating to keep adjusting your socks every 5 minutes. I can't. I can't deal with it. These are more annoying than anything. I ended up throwing them in the trash. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: h1985

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding, Post-Surgery
customer_reviews.text: I had corrective bunion surgery in February 2017. There is a 75% chance that the problem will reoccur. I started feeling pain again almost a year ago and didn’t do anything about it. I found this kit online and gave it a shot. The products are amazing and don’t cut off circulation. They are comfortable and simple. Not to mention, my dogs and cats love them too... so, make sure you store them in a drawer or something.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Not very functional
customer_reviews.text: This apparatus cannot work---at least not for me. There isn't a single rigid or half-rigid piece to apply any force to the big toe or to the bunion itself. The good thing is that I was able to return it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: M. Degani

customer_reviews.title: This kit is a game changer in easing foot pain!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! It has options for wearing around the house or inside shoes. The protectors/correctors are easy to put on and are extremely comfortable. It's made going for long walks so much more enjoyable! No more pain!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: It works, helps me every time, thank God
customer_reviews.text: I'm 34 and after wearing the wrong sport shoes I was noticing some pain on my left foot , and it was looking like I'm dealing with a bunion forming. I am very glad I bought this and I wore the Cloth/sock one immediately . I did notice pain going away in just 2 days. And I do wear it anytime my foot starts to act up and it seems to offer me relief. I wish I was good and wore it all the time, but I only wear it if I have to, lol. But it's good. Works for me every time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: Both of the splints broke within a week and I only wore them to sleep in. The other products are nice, but my main purpose for buying this set was for the splints. The other items are not anything that I would have bought if they weren’t included.
customer_reviews.author: Halloween Queen

customer_reviews.title: In my experience it was good choice
customer_reviews.text: After giving birth my last kid I suddenly had bunion out of nowhere. Of course It isn’t pretty for women. My bunion was ok at first but after 3 months I started to feel pain on my left feet while walking. So I searched everything. My pain wasn’t that much. But I didn’t want it grow bigger. Now I’m using this day and night. Sometimes I take them off. First 2 3 days were painful to my big toe. Now I’m just used to it. I hope it will help me little not to grow it bigger. If you started seeing bunion just take some action earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Isaura

customer_reviews.title: un beleivable
customer_reviews.text: After seeing 3 doctors that all said the same thing, you need surgery to correct your bunion. I was to the point where I couldn't wear shoes. I figured it couldn't hurt to try it. I wear it at night when I go to bed and I have already seen dramatic results. My foot is being pushed back into correct alignment while reducing the big calcium cap, Right now I'm about 50% reduced. My big toe was frozen and now it moves at the joints like it's supposed to. I Highly recommend you give this a try before submitting to the knife.
customer_reviews.author: max tanzen

customer_reviews.title: This provided amazing stability to help it heal (fast)
customer_reviews.text: I had a strained muscle in my toe joint due to my bunion, there was a sharp pain if I pinched the area between the toe and the second toe joint. This provided amazing stability to help it heal (fast). I super recommend it! It seems well made and held up well to use.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: I think these could work if.....
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome - lots of bang for your buck. Easy to clean, high quality, and very comfortable. I inherited the family bunions and am hoping to avoid them worsening and avoid surgery. I felt like there was a difference in the way my toes were lying the first week after I wore them around the clock. Now.... if only I could remember to wear them every day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamy17

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: The one element that cushioned the outer foot and separated the first two toes became very uncomfortable very quickly. Couldn't walk. My doctor thought the "exercise band" was amusing. That won't do anything but entertain your cat. A waste of money. Admittedly, I missed the return window. Seller couldn't even take the time to talk to me about it.
customer_reviews.author: philip birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Helping with toes crossing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Bunion Corrector for my mom for Christmas. She had a stroke a little more than a year ago and is having terrible problems with her toes crossing over now. She had pain from it the first day after wearing it 3 hours. So she tried it for shorter time period until she got used to it. She told me it doesn’t hurt wearing her shoes with it on and thinks it’s helping. Other pads and things she has tried have left sores and blisters. This product has not done this.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H

customer_reviews.title: Like the little sock thingy!
customer_reviews.text: I have only found a use for the little sock thing. It works great at night. Amazing what a difference it makes in my pain level. I was finding it hard to sleep some nights because that one little bunion pained so bad. I don't have to wear this every night, but I wear it when the thing is bothering me.
customer_reviews.author: Ozarks1

customer_reviews.title: I bought some toe socks and love them.
customer_reviews.text: These cut off circulation in my second toe and also cause it to sweat. I do not have big feet, size 8 ladies. However, the toe pull strap is something I currently use. Hoping it will pull the big toe to the side a little more. In the meantime, I bought some toe socks and love them.
customer_reviews.author: CatMac

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, buy one
customer_reviews.text: A variety pack of bunion relieving products. I wear the small toe separators every day while at work and the gym, I had shin splints and awful toe pain this last year. After a week I noticed my gym experience was so much better. The longer separators broke after 1-2 wears, I'm sure I can still wear them but they aren't as comfortable. The foot sleeves are just not comfortable, they slip off and I never wear them. I haven't tried the exercise device yet but I can't imagine it will do much. If I were to redo this order I would only buy the small separators.
customer_reviews.author: MLupher

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended for Runners
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these items and the little correctors are comfortable to wear on a daily basis. However, I wouldn't recommend it for running. After a couple of runs, they broke and they did not provide the support I expect it. I'm disappointed because that was the main reason why I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: YOLANDA AYALA

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend the standard spacers they stay on & are comfortable. The gel pad bunion protection sleeves don't stay in place, need re-situating often, an attached strap to go around the heel might help keep them on. The toe separator with bunion guard --- the bunion guard seems useless. I have not done the big toe strap exercises enough to decide whether it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BE practical but realistic
customer_reviews.text: Understand that you need surgery from a real doctor to get rid of a bunion. You use thinga like this it has to be on a continuous basis. It does not stay in place if you're active so wear if you have a sedentary job or when you can basically do some type of stretches to manipulate your bunion area
customer_reviews.author: Mia A

customer_reviews.title: The combination corrector in protective sleeve has been redesigned
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this set several months ago and was so happy with it that I ordered a second kit, just to get two more of the combination corrector in protective sleeve. Alas the new package of the kit has a version number "2.0" which documents there was a redesign and for me the redesigned version is too small. I have returned it and will be searching for a replacement, maybe locally where I can see if there is a version number or not. I would have given the original 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I find this set SUPER cheap, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've tried using a splint and a gel insert that goes between the big toe and the little toe. The gel didn't work that well, always slid out. In total, I find this set SUPER cheap, good quality, and already helps relieve pain. I'm a server so I'll be on my feet 12 hours a day. This will help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Will not provide relief
customer_reviews.text: After using these for a few months, I concluded that these do not work well -- and certainly do not provide bunion relief. In fact, no type of protector like this is going to help. I spoke to my orthopedic surgeon, and she agrees that there's no point to use them. If you Google bunions you'll learn more. I can still exercise (hike, play sports) with my bunions and not have pain, so I'll live with them unless and until they become a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Goalois

customer_reviews.title: Working the big toe back into position!
customer_reviews.text: Helpful! Working big toe into position. Only been using for about a month but can feel positive difference. Being a runner, my feet have never felt so good! I use on both feet. Only one has the bunion. Both feet better with the middle toe spacer. Will use for many months!
customer_reviews.author: Island Momma

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like the piece that allows your two big toes to stretch, however I am disappointed that the sleeves that go over both feet for “comfort” don’t fit well. I’m a female, size 9 feet. The sleeves are supposed to be easily worn over long periods of time. I wore them for a half hour and it felt like all circulation had been cut off my big toes! I took them off and sure enough they were numb. The sleeves were what I purchased this for. Pretty disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: I was not suffering from any pain, but I purchased this just to try to realign my toes. The box comes with a lot of stuff, but I ended up using only the smallest of the spacers. After about a week, the larger of the two white spacers had a small tear, so I stopped using it. I tried out the little exercise thing a few times, and it works, but I never continued with it. I've been using the small spacers for a few months now almost every day. Not sure if I notice any changes, but they are comfortable to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Willy Teav

customer_reviews.title: Helpful To Try Different Styles
customer_reviews.text: This variety package gave my wife the opportunity to try different bunion relief designs. Though they can be used differently, the cloth sleeve stays on at night, the small separator stays on when walking barefoot around the house, and the separator with the cushion for the bunion helps alleviate rubbing in shoes. The stretch exerciser is used while watching TV. Quality products. Easy care. Feeling better in the short run. Hoping for some longer term improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with pain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this twice. First time the separator was glued to the sleeve and came off after multiple wears. Second time the separator was sewn into the sleeve, so it's not going anywhere. Much better design. I wear this around the house and at night. I don't need surgery, yet, but I do have pain sometimes waking me in the night. This product helps reduce pain and align the toe. I have a lot of relief because of the compression qualities of the sleeve and the aid of the separator. Thankful for this!
customer_reviews.author: Mam Four

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: The gel pad attached to the sock was too big and bulky and the gel was not very cushiony. While the bunion was straightened out my foot hurt in other places. I most enjoyed the pad that slipped over the big toe and covered the bunion, but after 3 days of use it ripped in half. I will be returning this for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Dorkie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the plastic corrector at times, but it is not very comfortable. This stretchy one, which was a bit too tight at first, seems to be much more comfy. I did have to wear it a few nights, but it stretched out a bit and is now fine. The price is very good for all the stuff. Probably won’t use it all, but one or two pieces at the local drugstore chains would cost much more. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Wright

customer_reviews.title: Helped immensely
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my metatarsal pain. They are super soft and squishy which makes them extremely comfortable to wear. They don't work so well with shoes but I often am barefoot anyway since shoes hurt. A little powder makes getting them on super easy which also helps with any sweating while wearing. Great product, overall happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Traci C

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I get sharp pains in my big toe. These work great at relieving the pain by gently straightening my joint back to where it belongs. 3 different kinds of separators are in the package and they are designed not to fall off. There is one set for wearing with shoes. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bunion product ever
customer_reviews.text: I recently had bunion surgery and my Doctor told me that my big toe would go back to the bent stage even though the bunion was gone and he had also broke the bone in the toe and the one behind it. I didn't want that so I looked for something I could wear to prevent that from happening. Your products fit the bill perfectly for both day and night ware. For at least a year to come. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Groomlady

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I’m pain free!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I am 28, a size 6 shoe with painful bunion on one foot. I’m on my feet a lot at work and by the end of the day my foot was killing me. The spacers fit well and are very comfortable! The stretching band works well. I could only wear for a short time in the first week or two before it became painful, however after that I could wear them all day! Now I’m pain free, even when I forget to wear then during the day, I try to wear them at night. I’ve only been using them for a few months, however I have a mild bunion.
customer_reviews.author: KLP

customer_reviews.title: Know the severity of your bunion
customer_reviews.text: I had very high hopes that this would be a non surgical sollution for my bunion. I have tried 2 of the options in the package. In a pinch one of them will work short term. But for real on my feet time, the pain becomes excrutiating. So I'm stuck seeing a podiatrist to help me deal with the one I have since it must be beyond what this can do.
customer_reviews.author: kaylove

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions on both sides. I’ve tried many bunion correctors in the past. This one was a disappointment. The slip-on correctors are sliding off my feet, the stitches are coming off, the attached silicone came off after 3rd use (without any high activity, I was literally sitting on my desk and only got up a couple times to go to the kitchen). The silicone pieces are attached with some type of glue or something so it’s no surprise they came off. The only two products in this pack that I can recommend are the two little toe silicones that you can put on the second toe (next to the big toe).
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: I really was excited to try this out and had high hopes. It’s not a bad product but it does help my left foot bunion as my foot thumb is beginning to overlap and it rubs on to the toe next it. I use the sock when I wear my shoes/sneakers but my issue is when I have this sock on for a long time it begins to hurt. I like the clear gel ones they are more gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Simply_shereen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bunion care kit, in particular the toe separator with bunion guard. However, I have only worn them for less then two weeks and the the bunion guard section has already broken off one of the pieces. This is such a shame as it did provide me so much comfort. The standard spacer, causes too much friction and discomfort after awhile so I cannot wear for long. Due to the silicone not holding up, I cannot recommend the purchase of this product and only give it 3 stars for because of comfort, pain relief and softness.
customer_reviews.author: homebuilder

customer_reviews.title: bunion releif
customer_reviews.text: We have a grandma (mom) with terrible bunions, so she had corrective surgery on one foot but did not do well so she won't do the other. We got this product just to see if it would help. And help it did just gives her relief and allows to wear shoes again, that is the biggest problem. Not a surgery replacement but really helps with the pain and correcting slowly. Tackle it early.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great relief from the pieces that fit
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from foot pain related to my bunions. Unfortunately, my big tow is pretty wide, so all the pieces that loop over the big toe didn't work for me. They were way too tight and cut off the circulation almost immediately. But the blue and red stretcher gives immediate relief by pulling the big toes towards each other away from the rest of my toes. The piece that loops around the 2nd toe and puts a spacer between the big toe is also a huge relief.
customer_reviews.author: Jess R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small bunion on my right foot, but it was hurting at night and waking me up. This corrector relieved the pain the first night. I have been using it for about a month and now I don't have to wear it every night to be symptom free. So it must be doing something good! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have bunion pain try this!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for bunion pain relief. My husband injured one of his feet (creating a bunion) and has been very happy with these! The silicone is so soft and flexible and easy to clean. He can wear them with his shoes or with sandals and in and out of water too! I definitely recommend buying these!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Kit with a Variety of Tools
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I didn’t like was when I walk around for several hours wearing one of the toe correctors with my shoes on or under my socks I usually get a blister in between my big toe and second toe. But if worn just when sleeping or sitting a lot that doesn’t happen. Love the many different options of tools that this kit comes with. The strengthening resistance band is actually really useful even though I didn’t care much about it when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: kcc22

customer_reviews.title: Can be tight in certain shoes
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well.. I'm a nurse on a busy unit in a hospital. I'm on my feet a lot. I prefer nursing clogs which don't allow for a lot of extra room inside the shoes. The slip on piece is very helpful but it does make my shoes a bit tight.. that's the only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5. With other shoes it works great!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for preventative use a well!
customer_reviews.text: I self-diagnosed myself (always a good idea with webMD) with a developing bunion and figured I'd get ahead of it before it got too serious. I wore the sleeve to sleep for the first night, and it was rather painful. However, with just the second use my toe and foot was starting to feel much better! Now I wear it almost every night, and it brings a lot of relief. I honestly wasn't sure if it'd work, but so far so good! I haven't tried the other tools yet, but the sleeve alone is enough for me to give this product 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For me, a 'Do Nothing' product!
customer_reviews.text: The product did absolutely nothing to assist me. Instead of seperating the toe and protecting the 2nd toe, my second two had an indentation and was tilting to the left vs. remaining upright. It was making the problem seem worse. The materials are soft and I suppose thst could offer some comfort but the sleeve was too short for my 8.5 foot and rolled up at least 4 times in about 4 hours. Very disappointed. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: M Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not durable
customer_reviews.text: The clear one has broken and I only wore it 3 times. So not durable, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Use in my hockey skates. Couldn't find a better setup for the bump that has formed on the side of my foot from my skates. There are three different setups in the package (great deal BTW). The gel bunion that slips over the large toe is aligned in my skate, I don't even know that I have them on. They do not constrict and are washable. Perfect find!
customer_reviews.author: SK8ice

customer_reviews.title: Works for me so far
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this kit for a short while, but I already have found the “Toe separator and Bunion Guard” to be helpful. I wear it at home in my slippers. The difference between this and other sleeves/guards that I have used if the the spacer is big enough to make a difference in hw my big toe is aligned. The same seems true of the Sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: WLH

customer_reviews.title: Great for relieving pain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my fiancé who was heading down the road for surgery and wanted to avoid it. It definitely relieved his pain, however it didn’t do so much to actually correct the angle of his toe, but if you’re goal is ultimately to get pain relief, this definitely did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: I've only used the small toe separators
customer_reviews.text: I have minor bunions, I only use the smaller of the two separators. At first they hurt, and I only wore them at night. After a month I moved to wearing them during the day. They've helped reduce foot pain and the appearance of my bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Was working .  .  . but . . .
customer_reviews.text: Started using the sleeve with the bunion separator daily and it felt like it was making a difference. Until the separator fell off the sleeve, rendering it useless. So . . . with a shelf life of one week . . . that translates to $675 annually if mandated to purchase a new one every week. Gave it 2 stars because it was working until it broke irreparably. Going to try and return . . .
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Great Kids

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My bunion isn't huge, but it's big enough to make it uncomfortable to walk on sometimes. I wore all of these with shoes and they were all very comfortable and didn't hurt while my shoes were on. May I suggest, though, making a wider size variety for those with wider feet. It was a little snug on my foot, but it was nothing major. Anyone with super wide feet might be out of luck with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ellico

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I use the pad often, but it keeps falling off, won't stay on. It only stays on when wearing closed shoes. That is my biggest complaint. If it was a little tighter, or maybe add a strap to hold on to the hill it would work better. Overall though, it is comfortable enough with closed shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma G. Alcala

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: After having my daughter, it took a while for my feet to shrink back so I started to see bunions on my feet. I wore the soft toe corrector during the day with my heels and the sock at night for a week and could not only tell a difference in my toes but could tell a difference in how I walked. I wore them daily after that and there’s almost no turn to my big toe! For some that wears heels 5 days a week that’s nothing short of a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mc

customer_reviews.title: ... sleeve with the built in Cushion is the absolute best thing ever it also has toe separator attached which ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently started working as letter carrier for the usps I always had bunion there was no pain or swelling until I started walking full time so I order this set I have to say the sleeve with the built in Cushion is the absolute best thing ever it also has toe separator attached which did come off after second day I wear them so I definitely wish that part was Sewn in as well as a Opposed to the gluei just used the other toe separators that was in the pack and the sleeve together I also like the corrector as I can use it very Easily while I am playing video games, watching tv or reading a book
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This relieved pain in my knee
customer_reviews.text: This relieved pain in my knee as an unexpected side effect. I have a bunion on my right foot so I started using this set and as an unexpected serendipitous side effect, the horrible tightness behind my knee got much better. When I don't use the toe separators, the pain returns. Happy about this!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh L. Millis

customer_reviews.title: 46 years and working on her feet and finally pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my wife as she has 1 large bunion and a smaller one on the other foot. She has been a hairdresser for the past 46 years and stands " ALL DAY ". Even wearing proper foot products after that many years they still formed. She just wears them after work and all evening but she loves them as it has reduced the pain significantly and are very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Glad I decided on these.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the bunion protector kit and tried the options and am very pleased. I really like the softness and quality and comfort. Already wore the Standard Spacers at night, and they were comfy and stayed in place. The Gel Pad Bunion Protector Sleeve is also very comfy and I will try wearing it with shoes. When I don't have to think about foot comfort, you know they work. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bunion surgery recovery!
customer_reviews.text: These have been great in aiding me post bunion surgery. Keep in mind these don’t magically get rid of bunions..they help with pain/comfort and aiding recovery from surgery. They have been great for keeping my scar covered and holding my toe in alignment. They are also very comfortable and helped a lot with swelling!
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: It does help.
customer_reviews.text: This set is very comfortable and easy to clean. The separator with guard and the spacer really do feel great when woren with shoes or socks. The only issue that I've had trouble with is the gel pad sleeve. If you don't use sports tape or surgerical tape it will slip off when you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsteatimes

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for foot pain
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal! Everything you need in one set. I’ve purchased each of these items separately before finding this set. If you have bunions or you’re just starting to get that pain on the side of your big toe, this is the set you need.
customer_reviews.author: April90066

customer_reviews.title: Finally, some relief!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly when I bought this product my hopes weren't too high of it working, but thankfully I was wrong. I didn't get instant relief but the pain got noticeably better each day that I wore them. Most of the items are fairly comfortable, so much so I forget that I have them on, which is nice. The beige sock like one is hard for me to wear as it tends to cut the circulation off to my big toe, but the rest of the items are a God send! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Worked fairly well to push my big toe over to a more forward facing position, but it relies on pushing off my middle toe to do this vs a stiff splint on the outside of the big toe as other designs utilize. By relying on the middle toe as an anchor to force the big toe over, the middle toe is pushed a bit inward, which is not a result with which I am comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley Riveaux

customer_reviews.title: These are actually working!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this kit for about a week after some sudden postpartum foot pain. They're working even better than expected, and quickly!
customer_reviews.author: JFlavin

customer_reviews.title: Bunion  Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunion on my big toe which also has as arthritis condition. I have only worn the bunion pad for a week, but I do feel less pain. The pad does take some time to get used to wearing it on my toe. The bunion pad is easy to us,. and hopefully after extended use I will feel continued pain relief from my bunion.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about all the options this set came with but have to say I can only use the smaller spacer. The sleeve was so tight it cut off my circulation and made my toes numb and the seam also made walking uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mollie K. DeCost

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love all 3 options to keep my big toe straight and separate from the rest and the cushion for the joint. It help with my rock climbing so that it’s pain free almost and I can climb longer and more often. There is one occasion that I even put it on for my regular dress shoe and outing.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I showed this product to my podiatrist and he told me that this is a good product for bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Msandrya

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful bunion corrector!
customer_reviews.text: This bunion corrector kit is great! There are so many options to relieve pain. I spend a lot of time walking everyday, at least 8-10miles, and this kit has reduced pain that by the end of the day I could still go several more miles! The toe stretching band feels to be the most productive for helping, and the two options of toe separators are great for the different kind of shoes I wear throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective for prevention.
customer_reviews.text: maybe this is meant for people with really bad bunions, but I wanted to get something to prevent a bad bunion. I have a slight one and want to nip it in the bud before it gets bad, but the gel pieces are too soft and too small. the only one that seems like it does anything is the foot sleeve, but the toe hole is a touch tight, so wouldn't want to wear it overnight. The elastic piece, you have to pull your feet so far apart to accomplish anything- not like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: B. Argast

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Only one of the four products is really usable on a daily basis. The silicone separator with the side guard is great for wearing in shoes with socks but after 2 months one of them is already ripped. The individual toe separator is too thick to be comfortable and the sleeve is only good fit wearing at night, is terrible to walk in, and the silicone is coming off after only a few times wearing it. The bungee toe strap is just ridiculous and works my calf muscles more than I can say it helps straighten my toe. Poor quality but now I know what products I like and can invest in higher quality versions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, didn't help my pain, can't wear past 4 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not comfortable after about 4 hours of use. I wore one to work and it gave me a blister on my small toe- don't use if you walk a lot at work. I used at night several times but again, after about 4 hours, it hurts and I have to take them off. I understand if I can't wear them all day because of a variety of reasons but I was hoping to at least wear all night. Easy to use though and good price but didn't help my pain. I've used at least 15 times in the last month.
customer_reviews.author: Travl_grl

customer_reviews.title: This worked for my foot problem... pain is gone.  Crazy but it really helped me lol
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe it helped ! So easy and after suffering for weeks with foot discomfort, the pain is gone after just 3 or 4 few days of wearing it . I haven’t needed to wear it anymore but know which drawer it’s in when I do.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: not suitable for adult male feet - too small
customer_reviews.text: The small sized rubbery silicone toe separators and their small openings are too tight. The stretchy cloth item slips out of position making it unusable under socks/in shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she really likes them! She says, in the beginning, they feel more uncomfortable than other ones she's used but that's because it truly does the job of realigning your big toe. The product doesn't mold you your feet but rather works to straighten the curve and bunion out. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the rest but shields are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for the wedge piece to try to train my big toe. This set also came with a shield not found in the other sets I’ve seen. This shield is incredible and gives me unexpected pain relief and now allows me to wear boots again!!!
customer_reviews.author: VVLaRue

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These did nothing but give me more discomfort. I experienced more pain than usual trying to keep them in place. I’m embarrassed I fell for the reviews on this one but I was desperate for some relief and tried this.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

product_meta.title: Bunion Corrector & Bunion Relief Protector Sleeves Kit - Treat Pain in Hallux Valgus, Big Toe Joint, Hammer Toe, Toe Separators Spacers Straighteners Splint Aid Surgery Treatment
product_meta.description: Corrector & Bunion Relief Protector Sleeves Kit - Treat Pain in Hallux Valgus, Big Toe Joint, Hammer Toe, Toe Separators Spacers Straighteners splint Aid surgery treatment
feature_bullets: Treat your feet with our carefully selected 7 pieces set. The package is designed for bunion Corrector and bunion relief. One Size Fits Most Feet.
Relieve your pain, treat your bunion, reduce friction between your toes and enjoy walking again. Separate, straighten, stretch and align your toes.
A unique solution for your foot problems. Relief the pain in big toe joint, Hallux Valgus and much more.
Made from 100% medical grade silicone. Premium quality and perfect fit, soft and stretchable - easy to clean & reuse.
Flyen offers no-risk, no-questions-asked money back guarantee.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
